com.nokia.midp.examples.mm.devicecap
Class QueryProperty

java.lang.Object
  com.nokia.midp.examples.mm.devicecap.QueryProperty
public class QueryProperty
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapper for queries to System.getProperty() to retrieve Mobile Media support information.

Version:
1.1

Constructor Summary
QueryProperty()
           
 
Method Summary
(package private) static java.lang.String getCaptureSupport(java.lang.String media)
          Returns a String indicating whether capture, recording and snapshots of a given media format are supported.
(package private) static java.lang.String getPolyphonySupport()
          Returns a String indicating whether polyphonic playback is supported.
private static boolean isTrue(java.lang.String property)
          Returns true if System.getProperty(property) returns a String "true".

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

QueryProperty

public QueryProperty()
Method Detail

getCaptureSupport

static java.lang.String getCaptureSupport(java.lang.String media)
Returns a String indicating whether capture, recording and snapshots of a given media format are supported. The media format should be one for which Mobile Media defines a "supports. ... .capture" property. As of Mobile Media 1.0, this is "audio" or "video".

Parameters:
media - the format of interest, either "audio" or "video"

getPolyphonySupport

static java.lang.String getPolyphonySupport()
Returns a String indicating whether polyphonic playback is supported.

isTrue

private static boolean isTrue(java.lang.String property)
Returns true if System.getProperty(property) returns a String "true". Returns false otherwise.
